text: And he and all his troops set out for Baale of Judah 6:2 That is, Kiriath-jearim; see 1 Chronicles 13:6. to bring up from there the ark of God, which is called by the Name—6:2 Hebrew; LXX and Vulgate do not include the Name— the name of the LORD of Hosts, who is enthroned between the cherubim that are on it.
